ygData.subject: Re: Diamond dust
ygData.msgSnippet: Today I heard the words  What is diamond dust used for? and I just couldn t believe my ears when i was outside PAW......a 25th  high elf enchanter was asking
ygData.messageBody:
Today I heard the words "What is diamond dust used for?" and I just couldn't
believe my ears when i was outside PAW......a 25th high elf enchanter was
asking this in "Out of Character" while on the Fennin Ro Server in the Zone
of South Karanna..........I thought he may have been pullling my leg ,but I
dont think so..... i tried really hard to get the info first before telling
him, but once he sold the dust and found out what it was used for from
someone else he clamed up and wouldnt say where ....He got me soo
pissed!!.....Im at work now so i dont have the name handy of this whacked guy
that found the dust ,but I will post it when i get home by 8 am tomorrow
eastern standard time .Need to constantly bug this guy if were gong to get
any clue on this Location......This really happened people, this is no
bull...There is a Good possibility the Diamond Dust lies within the zone of
South Karana....If i find the source i will post it......Sincerely Cloverleaf
Lukyfeet "Supporter of Universal knowledge" <33rd Gnome enchanter
extrordinaire>
